abstract: The latest generation of submersible technology, including robots, lights, cameras and claws, can withstand the deep sea’s crushing pressures and has opened up a new world of shipwreck recovery.
snippet: The latest generation of robots, lights, cameras and claws can withstand the deep sea’s crushing pressures and has opened up a new world of shipwreck recovery.
lead_paragraph: The latest generation of robots, lights, cameras and claws can withstand the deep sea’s crushing pressures and has opened up a new world of shipwreck recovery.

headline.main: Silver Treasure, Worth $18 Million, Found in North Atlantic
headline.print_headline: Latest Devices Open Up a New World of Shipwreck Recovery
headline.seo: Silver Treasure, Worth $18 Million, Found in North Atlantic
